abstract: Wellstream Holdings, the British oil services group, said it had received several bid approaches, lifting its shares 30 percent and valuing the company at over £700 million.
snippet: Wellstream Holdings, the British oil services group, said it had received several bid approaches, lifting its shares 30 percent and valuing the company at over £700 million.
lead_paragraph: Wellstream Holdings, the British oil services group, said it had received several bid approaches, lifting its shares 30 percent and valuing the company at over £700 million ($1.1 billion), Reuters reports.
